title: Agreements for joint services of employees
context: ยง54-66 Agreements for joint services of employees. The board of water supply may enter into such arrangements and agreements as it deems proper, under which employees of the department of public works of the county may divide their time between performance of services on behalf of the department and on behalf of the board. [L 1949, c 86, ยง16; RL 1955, ยง146-115; HRS ยง54-66]
